alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 11:30PM CDT until June 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SEDGWICK AND SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kechi to near Eisenhower National Airport to near Clearwater, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Benton, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Viola and West Wichita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
